title: How to write a letter to the principal of a school asking to have a demo teaching - Quora

response.answer_text: Start off that its addressed to him/her specifically Go then to introduce yourself..then list your credentials experience and background Followed by outline of your planned demo teaching….when you get a thumbs up or approval sttick with that outline..no surprises on either end.. Also ask him/her to invite a couple of the teachers teaching there as well In closing thank them for their time and that you look forward to hearing from them. Be sure you have a good number for them to get ahold of you… Good luck in advance
